item.description:
Haystack is a module to do search, with multiple search engine backends. I use it to do full text search, spatial queries, faceting, document ranking, spellcheck, and suggestions.

I will do an interactive talk, starting from a simple app and doing the base install, then adding one feature, like separated model groups, or adding facets, or something.

Possible topics: facets, fancy data preparation, real-time indexing, advanced views, scaling, or general search strategy are all options(or just stopping). 

Haystack rocks, feels very djangolike, is powerful, and fun to write for!

 

Thanks to CustomMade for hosting this Django meetup.
item.name: Haystack Search
